Get Started

MiKare App

Empower Your Health Journey

Download the App

Download MiKare Health on the App Store and start your journey to better health management today.

Download on the App Store

Key Features

Symptom Tracking

Record and monitor symptoms with detailed logs that help identify patterns over time.

Health Insights

Get meaningful insights from your health data to better understand your wellbeing.

Family Profiles

Manage health records for your entire family in one secure, organised place.

Health Timeline

View your complete health history in a comprehensive, easy-to-navigate timeline.

Appointment Prep

Generate summaries and prepare questions for more productive healthcare appointments.

Secure Storage

Your health data is encrypted and protected with enterprise-grade security.

"MiKare Health transforms how you manage family healthcare. The insights and timeline make it effortless to stay organised and informed."
MiKare Health

MiKare Health is the smart, family-friendly app that helps you track symptoms, detect patterns, and understand your health with clarity and confidence.
